TopicTitle: [1.0x] Bacon Labs - Stockalike Ariane & More - Version 1.3.2 - New Descriptions! [21-June]

Articles.Content:
**Bacon Labs**

**"Ambitio itur ad astra."**

[![image.php?u=118256&dateline=1423949850](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/image.php?u=118256&dateline=1423949850)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/118256-_Augustus_)[![image.php?u=55092&dateline=1433130548&type=thumb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/image.php?u=55092&dateline=1433130548&type=thumb)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/55092-TheShadow1138)[![image.php?u=142259&dateline=1432765172&type=thumb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/image.php?u=142259&dateline=1432765172&type=thumb)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/142259-Shadowmage)[![image.php?u=68590&dateline=1432766062&type=thumb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/image.php?u=68590&dateline=1432766062&type=thumb)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/68590-GreeningGalaxy)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1egdYgYIpFE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AxZdxsCTwGk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Bacon Labs is a mod that adds in stockalike versions of realistic spacecraft, as well as some other parts. It currently adds Kerbalized versions of the Ariane 5, Ariane 6, ATV, Vega, Orion, ICPS, and Space Launch System at an about-64% scale.

Our goal is to provide safe, reliable space access to your Kerbals, bringing them first to Low Kerbin Orbit, then to the Mun and beyond.

**Downloads**

[![FRO6RIX.png](http://i.imgur.com/FRO6RIX.png)](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/688/Bacon%20Labs:%20Stockalike%20Ariane%20%26%20More) 

**Help**

> ![aXwZREll.png](http://i.imgur.com/aXwZREll.png)
> ![XNO0ZAH.png](http://i.imgur.com/XNO0ZAH.png)

***Known Bugs***

**None in stock game**

***Incompatible Mods***

[**AdaptiveDockingNode**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79128-1-0-AdaptiveDockingNode-1-7-Make-Your-Awesome-Docking-Port-Models-Universal!)**,** [**Docking Port Alignment Indicator**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43901-1-0-x-Docking-Port-Alignment-Indicator-%28Version-6-2-Updated-05-04-2015%29)**,** [**Navball Docking Port Alignment Indicator**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54303-1-0-2-Navball-docking-alignment-indicator-v7) **** - All of these break the docking ports and spam nullrefs.

[**USI Life Support**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116790-1-0-USI-Life-Support-ALPHA-0-1-0-2015-04-27) **** - Shadowmage is working with RoverDude to fix the autostage bug which breaks compatibility with the Auriga MPCV as well as many of his other parts, but for now this mod is incompatible.

***Compatible Mods***

[**RasterPropMonitor**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117471-1-0-2-RasterPropMonitor-still-putting-the-A-in-IVA-%28v0-20-0-4-June-2015%29)https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112693

**TweakScale**https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124336-PART-1-0-2-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v2-5-1

**MechJeb2** 

[**Hullcam VDS**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46365-1-0-2-Hullcam-VDS-Wide-Angle-Camera-Female-Kerbal-EVA-view-Updated-8-May)

***Recommended Mods***

[**KScale2**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125357-KScale2-%28A-mod-for-Kopernicus%29) **- 2x solar system, makes delta-v requirements pre-1.0. Also makes the SLS less overpowered.**https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124157-WIP-ShadowWorks-Stockalike-Space-Shuttle-External-Tank-and-Boosters?p=1996932#post1996932

[**Habitat Pack**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64442-1-0-x-Habitat-Pack-v0-41) **- BA-330s and Nautilus-X parts for all of your Kerbin System exploration needs.**

***More Info***

For those who do not want any meat in this mod, [DuoDex has made a fork](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124372-Meatless-Industries-1-1-1-1-0-2-%28Jun-4%29?p=1996782#post1996782).

For the dev thread, click [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114769-1-0-2-Bacon-Labs-Stockalike-Ariane-More-Dev-Thread?p=1820908#post1820908).

Source code for the included plugin can be found [here](https://github.com//shadowmage45/SSTUProductions).

To report bugs, click [here](https://github.com/00Augustus00/Bugs/issues).

***Roadmap***

**Version** **1.4 -** Add a bunch of new lander parts, a Kerbin Departure Stage, and potentially SLS Block II boosters. (Estimated release: Before the end of August)

***Contributors***

***(In chronological order)***

[![image.php?u=118256&dateline=1423949850](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/image.php?u=118256&dateline=1423949850)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/118256-_Augustus_)[![image.php?u=55092&dateline=1433130548&type=thumb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/image.php?u=55092&dateline=1433130548&type=thumb)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/55092-TheShadow1138)[![unknown.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/misc/unknown.gif)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/89487-tdubic)[![image.php?u=16436&dateline=1427999782&type=thumb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/image.php?u=16436&dateline=1427999782&type=thumb)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/16436-sal_vager)[![image.php?u=142259&dateline=1432765172&type=thumb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/image.php?u=142259&dateline=1432765172&type=thumb)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/142259-Shadowmage)[![unknown.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/misc/unknown.gif)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/118027-cipherpunks)[![image.php?u=22435&dateline=1366352755&type=thumb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/image.php?u=22435&dateline=1366352755&type=thumb)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/22435-BobCat)[![image.php?u=92978&dateline=1389480706&type=thumb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/image.php?u=92978&dateline=1389480706&type=thumb)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/92978-YANFRET)[![image.php?u=93381&dateline=1428433166&type=thumb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/image.php?u=93381&dateline=1428433166&type=thumb)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/93381-One-Way-Films)[![image.php?u=68590&dateline=1432766062&type=thumb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/image.php?u=68590&dateline=1432766062&type=thumb)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/68590-GreeningGalaxy) 

[**\_Augustus\_**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/118256-_Augustus_) - Owner, part config rebalancing and editing, 1.1 trailer, cookies

[**TheShadow1138**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/55092-TheShadow1138) - Juno & Hestia rockets, bugfixes, help with updating for 1.0, SLS boosters

ESV originally by [**tdubic**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/89487-tdubic)

[**sal\_vager**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/16436-sal_vager) - Flag, help with licensing and stuff

[**Shadowmage**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/142259-Shadowmage) - Auriga MPCV and ICPS

[**cipherpunks**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/118027-cipherpunks) - Rebalancing configs and whatnot

[**BobCat**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/22435-BobCat)**,** [**YANFRET**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/92978-YANFRET) ****  - Space Launch System core stage, decoupler, and fairing base originally by BobCat, core stage retexture by Yanfret.

[**One-Way Films**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/93381-One-Way-Films) - 1.3 trailer

[**GreeningGalaxy**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/68590-GreeningGalaxy) - New part descriptions

>

owner? don't you think that is misleading considering everything here was made by other contributors?

\_Augustus\_ I would strongly advise you make something for yourself before releasing this mod and claiming yourself as lead dev. While license wise you are doing nothing wrong it seems disingenuous to release something primarily by others, and quite insulting too.

**[MOD - Augustus, you're going to have to remove your Bacon Labs flag and German Space Alliance ATV parts from your add-ons, as the original licence is All Right Reserved (and the original authors have explicitly asked you not to redistribute/remix their parts)]**

Also, I personally don't think you should be advertising that you're the author of the Sarnus rocket parts until you've actually finished making them yourself.

mods please delete this post!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-15T00:49:33Z" title="05/15/2015 12:49  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 15, 2015</time> by hieywiey**

\_Augustus\_ you need to be ***extremely*** careful about this sort of thing. You can't just take other people's work and use it as your own. I know you probably only mean well but I suggest you take this down and rethink the way you approach modding. Learn modelling, make a simple parts pack, learn how to do things for yourself as far as you possibly can. Collaborations are great but what you are doing here is not collaboration, you are just taking other people's work and effectively claiming it as your own. 

People will respect you if you come to them with something you have made yourself and put some effort into. It gives your actions and what you say weight and meaning. Look at the way people like Beale and Porkjet approach things; they produce their own work with its own personality to it, and people look up to them because they bring something new and innovative to the table. What you have done here is to bring together a disparate collection of parts of varying looks and no distinct personality, none of which you have created yourself. There is nothing you can claim to be yours. Trust me, building a mod from the ground up and releasing it and seeing people comment on and enjoy work that you have made will bring much more satisfaction than collecting together assorted parts and releasing them as your own.

I don't mean to cause any offense by this because I know that you don't mean any harm and just want to get into parts modding. But ***this is not the way to do it***. Make something yourself and both you and others will enjoy it a lot more.

\_Augustus\_ will change the flag, though it is based on a publicly available design.

I can confirm that \_Augustus\_ does have permission from CTN to use his parts.

\_Augustus\_ will be removing parts he does not currently have proof of permission until permission is obtained.

For the rest of you, this is not the way to deal with any member who you suspect of wrongdoing, I will thank all of you to act with more decorum in the future.

Thread re-opened.

Also, [the flag does have prior art.](http://forum.nasaspaceflight.com/index.php?topic=23868.0)

> 
> Uhm, for the record, this is the real ATV flag:
> And if you're all so angry, how about you stop making hate posts on here, and instead do it on the dev thread? No one complained when the mod was in development.

Actually, many of us did complain, and try give constructive critique, but you told us "to keep comments positive."

> 
> If you people aren't gonna say anything nice, don't say it at all.

As I've said before, that's not fair to ask of people.

> 
> And also: At the end of the day, we're just trying to have fun. The KSP community is the best one I've ever found, and yet everyone seems to enjoy hating on me.

You've been really dismissive of people who have genuinely tried to advise you on how to properly author a mod, and get involved with add-ons. You seem dead-set on trying to do everything a mod-author does, without actually doing any of the nuts and bolts work yourself. You have got to learn to model and texture if you want people to view you as a competent mod author.

> 
> Also, Kartoffelkuchen, could you delete that post? It's hateful and irrelevant.

 I'm legitimately concerned that whatever he posted is now deleted. Hoping he did it voluntarily. Kartoffelkuchen has been pretty on point on what the problem is here, thought blunt he can be. Hoping whatever he said wasn't *completely* awful. I apologize if it was.
**@benjee10** is totally right. What you're doing *may* not be illegal, and *may* not be violating licesnses (I think...) but it is definitely in poor taste, and in very bad form here. The drama that was brought over to the Tantares thread really bummed me out frankly. You need to stop biting off more than you can chew, and be realistic about your capabilities. 

**@sumghai** is also correct. You shouldn't credit yourself for parts that you have yet to create... I mean... Why? 

**@sal\_vager**, I know you're doing your job, just try to understand both sides here while you're playing referee here. Maybe delve into the history of the mod, and look at how it was initially conceived. Pay a visit to the dev thread for Bacon Labs, and also the Tantares release thread. It's not all bad, and I don't think anyone here is unfairly treating **@\_Augustus\_**.

**@\_Augustus\_**, I'm genuinely sorry you're having a tough time here. Can you *pleeeeeeaaaasee* just listen to what many of us have been saying to you? Being twelve years old doesn't give you a free pass to avoid critique. Frankly, what you're capable of at twelve is fairly impressive, and we want to encourage you, really, we do. *However,* you need to pick up on what we've been telling you. Learn to model. Learn to texture. Stop relying on other people to do work for you. Be competent and skilled in your own right, and acquire the skills necessary to accomplish what you want to. If you keep kidding yourself about your abilities, you'll be met with critique and frustration at every turn.

I'll gladly give Bacon Labs a download, play around with it a bit, and be sure to submit reports on any bugs I find to try to improve the mod. Best of luck.

> And if you're all so angry, how about you stop making hate posts on here, and instead do it on the dev thread? No one complained when the mod was in development.

I call foul on that, several people complained but since you only allow criticism if it shows you in a positive light you most likely reported all of the posts that had complaints and had them deleted as they were there and are now no longer there. The same thing seems to be happening here as literally as I was posting this some posts above mine disappeared by the time I hit "post".

I've said it before and I'll say it again, you can't post something here and expect people to "only give good feedback". If you refuse to listen to criticism both negative and positive you will never learn from your mistakes.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-15T08:57:54Z" title="05/15/2015 08:57  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 15, 2015</time> by raidernick**

\_Augustus\_ will be accepting all *constructive* feedback, whether critical or praising, and I will be helping him ensure his packs are legitimate before release.

I have been in contact with both -ctn- and Eudae55, \_Augustus\_ has permission to use these parts from -ctn, and Eudae55's work is public domain.
